languages.text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.
languages.original_text: Оплот стойкости предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарду{/g} полное {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}" / 2) к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от дистанционных атак.

traits.locale_text: While Bulwark is active, the Vanguard counts as full cover for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of unyielding beacon)/2 damage deflection against ranged attacks.
While Bulwark is active, the Vanguard counts as full cover for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of unyielding beacon)/2 damage deflection against ranged attacks.

While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

languages.text: Оплот стойкости предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарду{/g} полное {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}" / 2) к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от дистанционных атак.
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Оплот стойкости предоставляет авангарду полное укрытие от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число знаков стойкости / 2) к отражению урона от дистанционных атак.
Оплот стойкости предоставляет авангарду полное укрытие от атак союзников, а союзникам на соседних клетках дает +(число знаков стойкости / 2) к отражению урона от дистанционных атак.

languages.text: 当坚若磐石效果激活时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}可以为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}效果。当相邻盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，给予该盟友额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于（{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数/2）。
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 当坚若磐石效果激活时，先锋可以为盟友提供全身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果。当相邻盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，给予该盟友额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于（不灭明光层数/2）。

languages.text: Mientras Bastión esté en vigor, se considera que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} a sus aliados y otorga a los aliados adyacentes +(acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g} / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra ataques a distancia.
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Mientras Bastión esté en vigor, se considera que el vanguardia proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} total a sus aliados y otorga a los aliados adyacentes +(acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza)/2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.

languages.text: Solange Bollwerk aktiv ist, zählt die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} für Ihre Verbündeten als volle {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und gewährt angrenzenden Verbündeten +(Stapel von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}/2) {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Schadensdeflektion{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: So lange Bollwerk aktiv ist, zählt die Vorhut für Ihre Verbündeten als vollwertige {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} und gewährt angrenzenden Verbündeten +(Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit)/2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Schadensdeflektion{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Tant que Rempart est actif, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} est considéré comme une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} pour ses alliés et il confère aux alliés adjacents un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +(cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide inflexible{/g} / 2) contre les attaques à distance.
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Tant que Rempart est actif, le Patrouilleur est considéré comme une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} totale pour ses alliés et il confère aux alliés adjacents un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des dégâts de +(cumuls de Guide Inflexible) / 2 contre les attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}.

languages.text: ブルワークが発動中、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は味方にとって{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽{/g}とみなされ、隣接する味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔攻撃{/g}に対して +({g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数)/2分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: While Bulwark is active, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} counts as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for their allies and grants the adjacent allies +(stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: ブルワークが発動中、ヴァンガードは味方にとって完全{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}とみなされ、隣接する味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して +(不屈の標のスタック数)/2分のダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を与える。
